RMCharacters.name: Rick Sanchezzzzz
RMCharacters.title: A brilliant but eccentric and alcoholic scientist who is Morty's grandfather.

RMCharacters.name: Morty Smith
RMCharacters.title: Rick's timid and easily influenced grandson who goes on adventures with him.

RMCharacters.name: Summer Smith
RMCharacters.title: Morty's older sister who occasionally joins in on the adventures.

RMCharacters.name: Beth Smith
RMCharacters.title: Morty and Summer's mother, a skilled horse surgeon and Rick's daughter.

RMCharacters.name: Jerry Smith
RMCharacters.title: Morty and Summer's well-meaning but bumbling father who often gets into comical situations.
